channel.title: Notification
channel.description:
Dear RSC Internal Members,
If you were not able to access this section before it was opened up to potential 'MoparClassic' developers/helpers than you are at risk of being removed from this board. This board does not have anything to offer, so it won't be much of an issue. We need to know who is willing to put in the time and effort into the project and if you're not interested, your access will be terminated. We will begin removing people from these boards on the 20th of September.
For those of you are interested, we will update you on our current progress, goals and plan of action.

i don’t want to be removed from the section as I do read whats going on here, however I do not know if I have much time dedicated to the project

[/quote]
this thread is over a year old![/quote]

Someone else bumped it!

Read full topic

item.title: Notification
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“KO9, post:20, topic:460031”]>>Also, you’ve been a moderator here for a long time, and you’ve never concerned yourself with anything related to this project before… So, I’ll ask again, why are you concerned all of a sudden?

Sunshine I was involved in this project from day 1. I quickly lost interest once it was clear that nothing was going to happen though.

As far about caring what you’re doing, I don’t think you’re right in your actions of mass removal of access is all. If an Admin wants to post here and confirm that they’re happy about you removing all these people’s access then fine.[/quote]Really? Because I didn’t know you did anything, seeing you only made 3 posts about it… 2 on April 27th, 2011 and 1 on June 7th, 2011. None of them indicate that you actually did anything or were involved in any way. So, how exactly were you involved?

I honestly don’t care what you think at this point… You’re obviously too dense to understand that they were added under the assumption that they would contribute in some way, and therefore have no business being here if they are meeting that expectation.

Also, all the admins were notified… If you want one to confirm it with you, then you need to go and ask for confirmation. I’m not going to waste their time and ask them to explicitly confirm things outside of PMs… The whole point of giving other people access to things, and responsibilities that come with them is so they don’t have to constantly be pestered with it.

Bottom line, you’re not in charge of the project, Rodgerwilco and I are; not only that, but this has absolutely nothing to do with you or projects you’re involved in. Now, if you want to contribute to the project, then great, otherwise you should mind your own business and worry about projects you’re actually involved in.

P.S. I’m starting to think you’re just continuing to cause trouble…

Read full topic

item.title: Notification
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

Also, you’ve been a moderator here for a long time, and you’ve never concerned yourself with anything related to this project before… So, I’ll ask again, why are you concerned all of a sudden?

Sunshine I was involved in this project from day 1. I quickly lost interest once it was clear that nothing was going to happen though.

As far about caring what you’re doing, I don’t think you’re right in your actions of mass removal of access is all. If an Admin wants to post here and confirm that they’re happy about you removing all these people’s access then fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Notification
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“KO9, post:17, topic:460031”]Just because he gave you the ability to administrate the section doesn’t mean you can remove everyone who doesn’t contribute towards your project. And I care purely because I am a moderator here. I don’t give two shits about the content on this board particularly and I’m not bothered about losing access myself though it’s clear from what you’ve said I’m not going to and was never under that impression. I don’t think it was mopar’s intention for you two to just be able to remove whomever you like.[/quote]We’re not just removing anyone who didn’t contribute to MoparClassic, we’re removing people that were added under the assumption that they were going to help.

Also, you’ve been a moderator here for a long time, and you’ve never concerned yourself with anything related to this project before… So, I’ll ask again, why are you concerned all of a sudden?

Also, if they didn’t want us removing people someone would have mentioned it, or said we only get access to add people. I should point out that MITB, Lothy, and Tahorak were all messaged regarding our access. All three responded and there was no objection to removing people for being inactive, and we were then given the ability to administrate the group. In fact, MITB explicitly said we were given permissions to add/remove people from the group.

If you’d like, I can PM you the relevant portions of the PMs, but honestly, I don’t see why you’re arguing with me about it; take it up with MITB. Maybe you should just stay focused on ProjectRSC instead of worrying about what is going on with other projects…
[hr]

[quote=“imthenull, post:18, topic:460031”]Thanks for ignoring me.[/quote]I didn’t ignore you…
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,562942.msg4106833.html#msg4106833

Read full topic

I don’t think it was mopar’s intention for you two to just be able to remove whomever you like.

Read full topic

item.title: Notification
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“KO9, post:15, topic:460031”]Well I thought hikilaka but apparently he actually was added to work on moparclassic. I was going to suggest swo0osh as well but he may have indeed also contributed towards mpc. Regardless I don’t exactly see how this is going to benefit the rsc community by removing people who were selectively added. If they are not contributing towards the section I see no harm in leaving their access, it’s not like their lack of contribution is somehow negatively affecting the board. It just seems very strange that you guys have taken it upon yourselves to do this. Have you actually cleared this with mopar or Lothy?[/quote]I don’t see how this is ‘selective’…

Also, sw0o0sh was added for MoparClassic: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,522860.msg3808426.html#msg3808426

[quote=“Moparisthebest”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=action=profile;u=547809 date=1335733538]
Below are the members that have access to the hidden rsc section. As most of them are just there to troll and in some cases use information for their own gains… maybe we can do a activity cut? People who don’t help with moparclassic by a specific date will be cut from the list?

I am not sure, but I am bring this up to you (mitb) and also cff to get his feedback on the subject. What are your feelings on this?

Crooks
cleako
Godandjesus
yong min
The Enforcer
adu
Motaro
nacional
imthenull
RSCShadow
sw0o0sh
Lightone
elyad
Not_a_bot
Pompano21
t4
-Nothing
dear god
Vend
NoLives
[/quote]

Currently xEnt can administrate who has access to that section, but since it’s really no longer his project, how would you two feel about administrating the access list?[/quote]There are a few PMs but it’s not really relevant.

Furthermore, I don’t see why you’re so concerned all of a sudden… Care to shed some light on that?

Read full topic

item.title: Notification
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:13, topic:460031”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=562942.msg4106661#msg4106661 date=1348071716]
There is not a single person that hasn’t contributed in some way, had access to this board before it being given the additional role, or added because of MoparClassic. So, I really would love to know the people that you can ‘pick off the top of your head’ that don’t fit into one of those categories.
[/quote]
Im going to use your famous quote here,

[quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=562942.msg4106661#msg4106661 date=1348071716]
I’m calling bullshit.
[/quote][/quote]If you think it’s bullshit, then give me a single name that contradicts what I’ve said…

Here is the list of people with access:

-Nothing adu All Day Ch3rry cleako CodeForFame Commando Crooks da real hype dear god dexto elyad Godandjesus IlikeArrays imthenull ip0wns Ix Andrew KO9 Lightone lil devil420 meatstick Miss Silabsoft Motaro nacional Newty NoLives Not_a_bot object Old Rsc Player Peeter Pompano21 Rodgerwilco RSCShadow Stork sw0o0sh The Djinn The Enforcer Vend vortex Vrunk xEnt yong min Zilent

[quote=“imthenull, post:13, topic:460031”]I have contributed to MoparClassic, and tell me, by removing people from this section, what is this accomplishing? This section is for Mopar’s ‘higher end’ RSC developers, NOT purely moparclassic.[/quote]Everyone who is going to be removed does not fall under the higher end, nor have they actually done anything for MoparClassic. There is no reason for them to be in this section, seeing they’ve shown they are not going to help. It also gives us a place to discuss things that shouldn’t be public knowledge.

[quote=“imthenull, post:13, topic:460031”]Edit: fyi

[quote author=Lothy link=topic=340624.msg2638339#msg2638339 date=1232677236]
This section has been created for those at the higher end of the RSC development community.

This section has several purposes:

[ul][li]To encourage significant development in a friendly environment by removing undesirable members.[/li]
[li]To increase your confidence in this website’s support for RSC development, which will, hopefully, encourage you to undertake joint projects with others that have access to this section, as well as sharing portions of your own personal RSC developments.[/li]
[li]To allow discussion that is RSC-oriented.[/li][/ul]

[/quote][/quote]Are you daft? It has already acknowledged it and explained how it’s already been accounted for, and this is in no way contradictory.

Seeing you need to see it again…
If you were not able to access this section before it was opened up to potential ‘MoparClassic’ developers/helpers than you are at risk of being removed from this board.
Everyone who was added (after this board incorporated MoparClassic), was added solely because of MoparClassic, and is therefore subject to removal.
This means, people who were here prior to the change or, who have contributed and still show interest will not be removed.

Examples:
Ch3rry - Added for MoparClassic. Has not contributed. Subject to removal.
object - Added before MoparClassic was incorporated. Not subject to removal.
imthenull - Added for MoparClassic. Has contributed. Subject to removal iff it is determined that he doesn’t show interest.

Read full topic

item.title: Notification

item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

CodeForFame:

There is not a single person that hasn’t contributed in some way, had access to this board before it being given the additional role, or added because of MoparClassic. So, I really would love to know the people that you can ‘pick off the top of your head’ that don’t fit into one of those categories.

Im going to use your famous quote here,

CodeForFame:

I’m calling bullshit.

I have contributed to MoparClassic, and tell me, by removing people from this section, what is this accomplishing? This section is for Mopar’s ‘higher end’ RSC developers, NOT purely moparclassic.

Edit: fyi

[quote=“Lothy, post:1, topic:258003”]This section has been created for those at the higher end of the RSC development community.

This section has several purposes:

[ul][li]To encourage significant development in a friendly environment by removing undesirable members.[/li]
[li]To increase your confidence in this website’s support for RSC development, which will, hopefully, encourage you to undertake joint projects with others that have access to this section, as well as sharing portions of your own personal RSC developments.[/li]
[li]To allow discussion that is RSC-oriented.[/li][/ul][/quote]

item.title: Notification
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“KO9, post:11, topic:460031”]This board is not purely for moparclassic development so what makes you think that everyone added post your arbitrary dates was recruited for mopar development? I know of some late additions I can pick off the top of my head that were added to this section with no intention of ever contributing towards moparclassic, but were instead added for the original purpose of this section. I see 0 benefit to removing people who you feel are not contributing towards your project. If there’s anything you want to discuss privately you can/should do it over PM.[/quote]I’m calling bullshit.

Also, we’re not moving discussion on MoparClassic things that shouldn’t be public knowledge into private messages, that is a primary reason the additional role of this board was added…

Furthermore, using the PM system as a thread is absolutely retarded when you already have a place for it.

Edit: I’ve gone through and accounted for everyone in the group. There is not a single person that hasn’t contributed in some way, had access to this board before it being given the additional role, or added because of MoparClassic. So, I really would love to know the people that you can ‘pick off the top of your head’ that don’t fit into one of those categories.

Read full topic

This board is not purely for moparclassic development so what makes you think that everyone added post your arbitrary dates was recruited for mopar development? I know of some late additions I can pick off the top of my head that were added to this section with no intention of ever contributing towards moparclassic, but were instead added for the original purpose of this section. I see 0 benefit to removing people who you feel are not contributing towards your project. If there’s anything you want to discuss privately you can/should do it over PM.

Read full topic

item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“KO9, post:9, topic:460031”]Sorry but no. This board is not purely for moparclassic development and the people who have access but are not on the moparclassic team shouldn’t be removed. If you guys want to have your private discussions you should get another section made or communicate via PM.

Read: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,340624.0.html to see why the board was created.[/quote]Read the OP carefully…

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:1, topic:460031”]Dear RSC Internal Members,

If you were not able to access this section before it was opened up to potential ‘MoparClassic’ developers/helpers than you are at risk of being removed from this board. This board does not have anything to offer, so it won’t be much of an issue. We need to know who is willing to put in the time and effort into the project and if you’re not interested, your access will be terminated. We will begin removing people from these boards on the 20th of September.

For those of you are interested, we will update you on our current progress, goals and plan of action.[/quote]
Everyone who was added after that point was added solely because of MoparClassic, and is therefore subject to removal.

Read full topic

Sorry but no. This board is not purely for moparclassic development and the people who have access but are not on the moparclassic team shouldn’t be removed. If you guys want to have your private discussions you should get another section made or communicate via PM.
